Package pl.polsl.lab.patients.controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab.patients.controller.PatientController
public class PatientController
extends java.lang.Object
Represents controller of MVC structure, which operates on model and view structures.
Version:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String dbPath
    Path to data base file.
    private PatientsList model
    Model class object.
    private java.util.Scanner scan
    Object of Scanner object, used to get input from user in console.
    private PatientView view
    View class object

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PatientController​(java.lang.String filePath)
    Instantiates a new Patient controller.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private boolean addRegistration​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String pesel, java.lang.String phoneNum)
    Method used to control model method .addPatient.
    private void checkRegistration()
    Method to print information for user about registration by entered id from user.
    void initController()
    Initialization of controller.
    private void initView()
    Printing main-first page of application.
    private void newRegistration()

    • dbPath

      private java.lang.String dbPath
      Path to data base file.

      Model class object.

      private PatientView view

      private java.util.Scanner scan
      Object of Scanner object, used to get input from user in console.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientController

      public PatientController​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Instantiates a new Patient controller. It also create new model and view objects.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path

  • Method Details

    • initController

      public void initController()
      Initialization of controller. It contains main loop which keeps program up.

    • initView

      private void initView()
      Printing main-first page of application.

    • addRegistration

      private boolean addRegistration​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String pesel, java.lang.String phoneNum)
      Method used to control model method .addPatient. It supports exceptions by try{} catch(){} blocks.
      Parameters:
      name - name of user to be added.
      lastName - last name of user to be added.
      pesel - PESEL of user to be added.
      phoneNum - phone number of user to be added.
      Returns:
      boolean information about success of adding operation.

    • newRegistration

      private void newRegistration()
      Method gets information from user (name/last name/PESEL/phone number) and finally loads it to another function to add new user.

    • checkRegistration

      private void checkRegistration()
      Method to print information for user about registration by entered id from user.
